text: Robert Archibald Adderley (1870–1946) was Dean of Ardfert from 1938 until his death."The Church of Ireland in County Kerry" Murphy, J.A. p243: Cork, Lulu, 2016 Adderley was educated at Trinity College, Dublin and ordained in 1903.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1929/30 pp6/7: Oxford, OUP, 1929 After a curacy at St Mary's Cathedral, Tuam he was the vicar choral at St Mary's Cathedral, Limerick. during World War One he was a chaplain to the Forces. He was Rector of Listowel from 1918; of Killehenny from 1922; and Brosna from 1928. ==References== Category:Alumni of Trinity College Dublin Category:Deans of Ardfert Category:1870 births Category:1946 deaths
title: Robert Adderley
